about_the_game:
Dookie Clicker is the most absurdly addictive game that unapologetically puts you in charge of a steaming pile of... well, you know. Your mission? Click the crap out of it and watch as your dookie evolves from a simple turd into a majestic, over-the-top, freak show of fecal artistry.

Why Should You Give A Crap?

  • Push Harder: Upgrade your clicking power, passive income, and more to turn your dookie into a grotesque masterpiece that would make even the most seasoned toilet tremble. Finish it all with The Big Flush™️ and then hit endless mode to complete your collection of skins.
  • Polish a turd: We've made it possible. From jellies to precious metals, you can dress up your Dookie in a growing assortment of common, rare, and ultra rare skins, which are tradable and marketable.
  • Disgustingly Addictive: It’s gross, it’s offensive, and it’s so satisfying that you won’t be able to stop yourself from going deeper down the toilet bowl.
    Perfect for anyone who’s ever wanted to embrace the absolute absurdity of life and laugh in the face of decency. Because sometimes, you just want to revel in the ridiculous.

Get ready to click the crap out of it— because if life’s a joke, this is the punchline you’ve been waiting for.

highlighted.name: Yeah, the fly is the problem here...
I think there is an underlying cause...
Seriously, this is getting out of hand.
What do you want, a medal?

name: Dookie Clicker

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: intel 4 core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1660
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
